etomica.atom

Class DiameterHashByElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.atom.DiameterHashByElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiameterHash

    public class DiameterHashByElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiameterHash
    This class hashes atomic diameters based on the element. A static method is provided that populates the hash with some default diameters based on VWD radii.

      • getDiameter

        public double getDiameter(IAtom atom)
        Description copied from interface: DiameterHash
        Returns an appropriate diameter for the given atom. If no diameter is known for the atom, -1 is returned.
        Specified by:
        getDiameter in interface DiameterHash
